snippet.title: Hearts of Iron IV: The Great War - Open Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Follow us:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WolferosProductions
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WolferosProd

Hearts of Iron IV: The Great War is a First World War Total Conversion Mod for Hearts of Iron IV. Play through the early 20th Century and witness the events that led to the First World War. Fight alongside with the Central Powers or the Allies from the Russian Steppes to the bloody Trenches of Verdun. Take part in the First Massive Aerial Warfare of History and, for the first time, deploy Tanks on the Battlefield.

Available Now: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=699709023

Available on Mod DB: http://www.moddb.com/mods/hearts-of-iron-iv-the-great-war1/

Music used in the Video: Symphony No. 5 in C minor of Ludwig van Beethoven
Full music available here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ppnsgiQ-WMk
